title: Tessa's First Glass Beads
description: A Sex Shop Novella Tessa Bailey has had enough! Enough of a job that has done nothing but suck the life out of her. Enough of sitting back and watching life pass her by. Just enough of everything! When presented with an opportunity for something crazy and fun by her best friend, Tessa decides to jump in with both feet. Little does she know what she is getting herself into. Sometimes you have to be willing to learn something new to really live.
author: E.S. McMillan
